author: Happy customer
title: Happy customer
text: Unlike most tire experiencesâ€‹ in my life I found that I wasn't just another person. I felt like the tire professionals at Town Fair tire really wanted to make the tire experience about me. I got a great set of tires and at a price that fit my budget. Thank you Town Fair.
